duties_responsibilities.duty: Greeting and assisting guests with superior customer service and product knowledge.
Maintaining store cleanliness and restocking products to company standards.
Handling cash transactions, refunds, and exchanges with courtesy and professionalism.
Participating in physical inventory preparation, execution, and follow-up.
Promoting and informing guests of current promotions, events, and services within the store.
Ensuring overall store cleanliness including restrooms, cashwrap, backroom, and sales floor.
Staying informed regarding new or existing products to better serve guests.
